subject: Dear sir
body:
Dear sir
I am Mr.George Dankata, I work in the Remittance Dept of Bank of Africa  Abidjan Cote d'Ivoire. I have an urgent and confidential business transaction that demands confidentiality and trust as it involves $4.8M and it will be of mutual trust and benefits to both of us. I need your honesty and sincere trust to achieve the transaction. Confirm your interest with your direct email address and your direct phone number.
Thanks
Mr.George Dankata

subject: Re:   Dear sir
body:
Dear Dankata,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your trust and the opportunity you are presenting. I am interested in learning more about this urgent business matter. However, before proceeding, could you please provide me with some additional information? Specifically, what is the nature of this business and how exactly would it be mutually beneficial?

Also, I prefer to communicate via email initially. My direct email address is . As for my phone number, I would like to know more details before sharing that information.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello! How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear Silva
Thank you for you your kind and understanding response to my mail and your
sincere willingness to assist me in this transaction that will bring us to
a wonderful relationship and mutual benefit.
I am happy to have your trust and I want to assure you that you will not be
disappointed. I have carefully considered your position and your sincerely
as to assist me to provide your safe bank account as the beneficiary
account to receive this funds that you will be legally made the next of kin
and appointed beneficiary.
The funds is presently deposited with the bank of Africa and it is 100%
legal and without any hitch.
I have the certificate of deposit to the funds and will be sending it to
you for your confirmation as all you need is to act as the beneficiary and
next of kin as you provide the safe bank account so that you will receive
the funds while I will now come over to meet with and with your help settle
with my family to start a new life.
I am putting my trust and confidence in you and I know that you will not
disappoint me
I have carefully concluded all the modalities for your position and I will
be here on the background to cover you.
I now need your full name and address as the appointed beneficiary to
submit to the bank and I want to assure that this transaction will legally
concluded and hitch free
I will send you the copy of the certificate as I received your details and
your confirmation of trust
I wait your immediate response
Thanks
Mr George Dankata

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear Mr. George Dankata,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing me with this opportunity. I appreciate your trust in me and I am willing to assist you in any way I can.

I understand that the funds are currently deposited with the Bank of Africa, and I am ready to help facilitate the process as your appointed next of kin. Please provide me with more details on how we can proceed further.

Could you please share more information about the next steps involved in transferring the funds to my safe bank account? Additionally, what documents will be required from my end to ensure a smooth and legal transaction?

Looking forward to your guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear Silva
Thank you and God bless you for your kind response and your honest desire
to assist me in this transaction. I want you to confirm that you received
the copy of the certificate of deposit that I sent to you and you are also
required immediately to send me your full name and address with your direct
WhatsApp number and your nominated bank information as the appointed
beneficiary to the funds as to enable me confirm to you the contact of the
bank accredited attorney that you will contact and request for his legal
services to represent you and transfer the funds to your account
Thanks
George Dankata

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear George Dankata,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your trust in me. Yes, I have received the copy of the deposit you sent. Could you please provide more details about the process and how we can proceed further? I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
From George Dankata
Attn Silva
Dear Silva
Thank you for your kind mail and your confirmation to the receipt of the
copy of the funds certificate of deposit as i am now fully assured of your
sincere willingness to assist me in this transaction that will bring us to
a strong relationship and of mutual benefit. The funds are presently in the
deposit of the bank of Africa as have been informed and i have carefully
concluded all the modalities for your coming as the next of kin and the
appointed beneficiary that will provide the bank account for the funds
transfer. I have also confirmed the contact of an accredited bank attorney
that you will contact and request for his legal service to represent you
and legalize the transaction.
I will send you the contact as you confirm as requested your full name and
your address with your direct phone number and your nominated bank
information as the beneficiary account.
I want to assure you that there will be no concern as i will be here to
monitor the transaction while the attorney that you will contact will act
on your behalf.
I wait your confirmation as you send the informations
Thanks
George Dankata

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello George,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your trust in me to assist with this matter. Could you please provide more details about the funds and how I can proceed with the next steps? I would like to understand the process better before moving forward.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello George,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this information. I appreciate your trust in me to assist with this matter. Could you please provide me with more details about the funds and how I can proceed further? I would like to understand the process better before moving forward. Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
From; Goerge Dankata
Attn; Silva
Dear Silva
Thank you for your kind mail as i am surprised that you have not sent me
your full details as requested to enable  us proceed and start up the
transaction. I have informed you that you are coming to act as the next of
kin and the appointed beneficiary to the funds deposit as i have carefully
concluded all the modalities for you to come and take that position . You
will be using the service of an accredited bank attorney that will on your
behalf legalize the transaction and help you to transfer the funds to your
nominated bank account. I will also be here to work with you so you are to
be rest assured.
I wait your confirmation as you send the deatials
Thanks
George Dankata

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello George Dankata,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your email and the information you have provided. I am interested in learning more about the process you mentioned. Could you please share further details on how we can proceed with this opportunity? I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello George Dankata,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your email and the information you have provided. I am interested in learning more about the opportunity you mentioned. Could you please provide me with further details on how the process works and what steps I need to take next?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear Silva
Thank you for you your kind and understanding response to my mail.
I now need your full name, your direct telephone numbers and your  address
as the appointed beneficiary to submit to the bank and I want to assure
that this transaction will legally concluded and hitch free
I will send you the copy of the certificate as I received your details and
your confirmation of trust
I wait your immediate response
Thanks
Mr George Dankata

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello Mr. George Dankata, thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your prompt response. Before I provide any personal information, could you please clarify the purpose of needing my full name, telephone numbers, and address for submitting to the bank? I want to ensure that everything is legally concluded as you mentioned. Looking forward to your explanation.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear Silva
Thank you for your kind mail and your sincere trust to assist me in this
transaction that will be of great mutual benefit to both of us. I contacted
you on trust and I know that with your position as my appointed beneficiary
and next of kin to the funds deposit the transaction will be smooth and
will bring us to a good relationship.
I have carefully concluded all the modalities for the transaction to be
successfully transferred to your nominated bank account as the appointed
beneficiary.
I need you to provide a safe bank account as the beneficiary account for
the transfer of the funds with your full name and address that will be
submitted to the bank as the next of kin.
I have also confirmed an accredited bank attorney that you will contact and
request for his legal services to represent you and legalize the
transaction on your behalf. The funds are presently in the suspense deposit
of the bank and everything will be legally confirmed as I will be here to
monitor the transaction.
You are therefore to send immediately your nominated bank account where the
funds will be transferred and your full name and address as the appointed
beneficiary.
I am waiting for your kind confirmation so that we can proceed. You are
rest assured that the transaction will be safe and smooth
Thanks
George Dankata

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello George,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate your trust and am interested in learning more about how we can proceed. Could you please provide me with more details on the next steps involved in transferring the funds to my nominated bank account? Additionally, I would like to know more about the accredited bank attorney that you have mentioned.

Looking forward to your response so we can move forward with this mutually beneficial arrangement.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear Silva
Thank you for your kind mail and I am happy to have your trust. I am yet to
get your full details as requested that is your full name and address as it
is important that I know who I am trusting with this transaction. I have
all that you need to know as I have carefully concluded this transaction
and I want to be absolutely sure that you are willing to assist me. Confirm
the information I requested and I will send you the contact of the attorney
as confirmed
I wait your confirmation
George Dankata

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello George Dankata,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your trust and willingness to share information. I understand the importance of confirming details before proceeding. Could you please provide more information about the assistance you are seeking? Once I have a better understanding, I will be able to confirm the requested details.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear Silva
Thank you for your kind response and your sincere willingness to assist me
but you have not replied to my request as my appointed beneficiary I want
you to send me your full name and your address with your direct phone
numbers so that I can confirm your trust as my appointed beneficiary. I
will give all the details to the transaction once you confirm these
information.
Thanks
George Dankata

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello George,

I appreciate your message. I understand the need for trust and verification in such matters. Could you please provide me with more details about the appointment and how confirming my information will help in this process? Thank you.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello George,

I appreciate your message. I understand the need for trust in such matters. Before I provide any personal information, could you please share more details about the appointment and how my information will be used? Thank you for your understanding.

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear Silva
Thank you and God bless you for your kind mail as I can now understand why
I contacted you in this transaction as I am fully convinced that you will
use your position and knowledge to handle this transaction and secure the
funds in your safe bank accounts while I and my family now come to meet
with you and with your help start a new life and invest in your country.
The funds is in the suspense deposit of the bank of Africa as I have
already informed you and I have also informed the bank that you are the
only surviving relative and the next of kin to the funds deposit. Now you
are coming as the beneficiary that will provide the bank accounts for the
bank to transfer the funds. You will be using the service of an accredited
bank attorney here since you can not come here physically and the attorney
will on your behalf legalize and normalize the transaction. Everything will
be legally confirmed and I will also be here to monitor the transaction. I
need your full name and address to submit to the bank as the appointed
beneficiary and next of kin.
The bank will now transfer the funds and you will receive it and I will
come to meet with you. You are free to ask any question for more
clarification.
Thanks
George Dankata

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear George,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this information. I appreciate your trust in me to handle this matter. I am interested in learning more about how we can proceed with securing the funds in my safe bank accounts. Could you please provide me with more details on the next steps involved in this process? Additionally, I would like to know more about the accredited bank attorney who will be assisting us.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear Silva
Thank you for your kind response and your reaffirming your interest and
willingness to assist me in this transaction that I have placed my trust in
you. The funds will be transferred to your nominated bank account from the
bank as your beneficiary status will be legally confirmed which is what the
bank attorney will be processing on your behalf. The bank attorney will on
your behalf legalize the transaction and process the funds deposit for
immediate transfer to your accounts
The accredited bank attorney is a highly reputable and reliable attorney
and I will send you his contact for to contact him
Having confirmed this information as required I want you to send
immediately the full details as I requested to enable us proceed. The copy
of the funds certificate of deposit will be sent to accordingly
Thanks
George Dankata

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear George Dankata,

Thank you for reaching out and providing me with this information. I appreciate your trust in me to assist with the transfer of funds to my nominated bank account. I am interested in learning more about the process.

Could you please provide me with more details on how we can proceed? I would like to know what specific information you need from me to facilitate the transfer. Additionally, it would be helpful if you could share the contact details of the accredited bank attorney so that I can get in touch with them.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear Silva
Thank you for your immediate response as I am happy to have you as my trust
beneficiary as you have shown capacity to handle the transaction.
I need you to send me your full name . Your address and your direct phone
number
The contact of the bank attorney will be given to you once you confirm this
information
Thanks
George Dankata

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello George,

I appreciate your prompt reply. Before I provide any personal information, could you please share more details about the reason you need my full name, address, and phone number? It would help me understand the situation better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Dear Silva
Thank you for your kind mail as I am truly happy that I contacted a very
calculative person that will not help me to secure this transaction but
will also be wise and matured to provide me the opportunity of investing my
share in a lucrative business after the transaction.
I quite understand your concern and you can be rest assured. I initially
requested your assistance to help to secure this transaction and provided
your safe bank account for the transfer of the funds as the next of kin and
funds appointed beneficiary. Upon your kind response and acceptance I have
appointed you the next of kin and the beneficiary to funds that your
deposited by your supposed late relative and now I need your full details
to submit to the bank as the beneficiary to the funds so as to enable us
proceed with the funds transfer modalities for you I informed you that you
will use the service of an accredited bank attorney.
The bank is waiting for me to submit your details in full as the next of
kin and funds appointed beneficiary that will give access to transfer this
transaction and have the funds transferred to your nominated bank account
That is what is required from you
Thanks
George Dankata

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello George,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate your trust in me to assist with securing and investing the funds. Could you please provide more details about the process of transferring the funds? I would like to understand how everything will work before proceeding.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Silva

subject: Re: Dear Silva
body:
Hello George,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I appreciate your trust in me to assist with securing and investing the funds. Could you please provide more details about the process of transferring the funds to my bank account? I want to make sure everything is clear before proceeding.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Silva
